Subject: The Stalker Stalks

::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe watches the short battle between Lunarpine and the tiger from 
behind the bushes of the clearing. He narrows his eyes, carefully taking out 
his gun and not making any sound. He raises the gun, putting the scope to his 
eye as he carefully aims at the place right between Lunarpine's eyes.

DeathScythe chuckles softly, pulling the trigger, a bolt tearing off at 
Lunarpine.
